name: Spectral Core
tag_list: database, comparison, synchronization, access, dbase, foxpro, excel, interbase, firebird, mysql, oracle, postgresql, odbc, paradox, sql-server, csv, xml
overview: Spectral Core is a database tools maker. It provides software for wide range of database-related tasks. Spectral Core products cover database conversion/migration, translation of all database objects (tables, procedures, triggers, functions, UDTs etc.), hyperlinked documentation creator, database schema and contents comparison and synchronization and more. Databases supported: Access, dBase, FoxPro, Excel , Interbase, Firebird, Lotus 1-2-3, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, ODBC, Paradox, SQL Server, CSV, XML. We support both latest versions, and old versions of all the databases listed. Wherever possible, dedicated native database components/readers are used for maximum throughput instead of intermediate translation layers like ODBC and OLEDB. Our products: Full Convert - a very fast database converter, used to migrate tables, data, indexes and foreign key constraints. It is very customizable, allowing for complete control and transformation during conversion. Achieves throughput of over 20 thousand records per second. Features built-in scheduler for recurring conversions, database explorer, editable data grid, global, per-project, and per-table datatype mapping, default values mapping, calculated expressions, runs custom SQL scripts before and after conversion - and much more.. SQL Translator - advanced database object translator. Achieves near 100% translation of all database code from source dialect to the target dialect. Data Sync - sophisticated database contents comparison and synchronization tool. It is able to synchronize contents of Access, SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, Interbase/Firebird, PostgreSQL and ODBC-enabled databases, and even supports cross-database synchronization (meaning, you can easily sync Oracle with SQL Server for example). Sync Database for MySQL - MySQL schema comparison and synchronization tool. Documenter - documentation creator for SQL Server databases. Creates hyperlinked documentation of all database objects (tables, views, triggers, indexes, constraints, UDTs etc.) in two formats - HTML and CHM (Windows Help file format). Features built-in FTP client and can automatically upload the generated documentation to your web server.
